title: 110_hr6784
content: Home Heating Oil Assistance Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual taxpayer an income-based refundable tax credit for the lesser of 33 of such taxpayer's residential energy costs for a taxable year, or $500. Defines residential energy costs as amounts paid: (1) to any utility for electricity or natural gas used in the taxpayer's principal residence during the heating season. And (2) for any qualified fuel used as the primary fuel for heating the taxpayer's principal residence.
